title: Cryptmaster Review - It's Ingenious!

Cryptmaster is Wordle x an Adventure Game! From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GL-nEm2EzHo Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.
